sections.content:
B.T. = **Beginners Toolbox!** 🔨 

Welcome to **Crypto Beginners Toolbox!**

Here you'll find all the practical 'how to' guides you need to get started in crypto.

If you already know all this stuff, then stop wasting my time and get started on the fundamental lessons.

However, if you're just starting out you'll need to know all the basics. 👇🏽 


> Knowing how to buy crypto **does not equal 'knowing crypto'.**
> 
> If you buy a crypto position and think you know how to 'do crypto' then you're destined for failure.
> 
> DON'T BE LAZY -> **PUSH THROUGH TO THE FUNDAMENTAL LESSONS** AFTER YOU FINISH THE BASICS

**Beginners Toolbox** - Security & Tech Basics

•




**Beginners Toolbox 2** - Don't fall for scams in DeFi!

•




**Beginners Toolbox 5** - How to buy SPOT positions on a CEX

•




**Beginners Toolbox 6** - How to trade futures on a CEX

•




**Beginners Toolbox 8** - How to buy SPOT on a DEX

•




**Beginners Toolbox 9** - How to trade futures on a DEX

**"Which wallet should I use" **
‎
It depends if you want 'safest and annoying to use', or 'easy to use and moderately risky'.
‎
> **Safest and annoying to use** = Trezor [https://trezor.io/]
> 
> **Easy to use but moderately risky** = Metamask [https://metamask.io/]
‎
I prefer metamask because I understand the risks. You choose what's right for you.

Metamask is good, but its still just a piece of software.

To get ultimate crypto security you need a hardware/cold wallet.

**"Why don't you recommend ledger?"**

> Ledger tries too hard to innovate. This is a massive systemic risk.
> 
> Compare ledger (constantly trying to make something better that was already fine) to BTC (something which never changes).
> 
> BTC is the king because its security is already perfect and it can't be changed.
> 
> Ledger is shit because they started with simplistic security they keep trying to change it through 'improvements'.
> 
> These 'improvements' only lead to complexity and vulnerability.
> 
> Can you see the conceptual problem here?
> 
> We don't need improvements, we need reliability. The entire company philosophy is compromised.
> 
> Recommend against ledger. Use Trezor.

**Beginners Toolbox **- Crypto Words & Definitions
